# Instantaneous center calculations
${I_{C}}A = \frac{6.215}{cos(14.31)} + 3.4733 = 9.883 inches$

${I_{C}}B = \frac{4}{tan(35.03)} = 5.706 inches$

# Velocity calculations
${\omega_{2}} = 0.428 rad/sec$

${V_{A}} = (AD){\omega_{2}} = 3.4733(0.428) = 1.487 inches/sec$

${\omega_{3}} = \frac{{V_{A}}}{{I_{C}}A} = \frac{1.487}{9.883} = 0.15 rad/sec$

${V_{B}} = ({I_{C}}B){\omega_{3}} = (5.706)0.15 = 0.859 inches/sec$

${\omega_{4}} = \frac{{V_{B}}}{(BC)} \frac{0.859}{8.054} = 0.107 rad/sec$
